attributes.action: facilitate the provision of Revlimid (lenalidomide) on the NHS following the draft NICE report that says 'no'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NICE has stated that Revlimid will not be provided on the NHS for patients with Multiple Myeloma.  It is not too late for the [draft] decision to be reversed.  Please support this petition.
